Pre-Game Insights: A repeat of the 2022 semi-final, India vs England, will take place in Guyana on June 27.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will play the second semi-final in Guyana on June 27, a day game (8:30 PM IST), more suited for the Indian TV audience.
Others: The semi-finals will each have additional time added in order to complete the match which will total 250 minutes.
For the first semi-final on 26 June, 60 minutes will be available at the end of the dayâ€™s play with the remaining 190 minutes scheduled for 2pm on 27 June.
